solution_line_template: Elrond was able to get {arwen_tulips} x {elrond_multiplier} = <<{arwen_tulips}*{elrond_multiplier}={elrond_tulips}>>{elrond_tulips} tulips.
Therefore, the total number of tulips they were able to get is {elrond_tulips} + {arwen_tulips} = <<{elrond_tulips}+{arwen_tulips}={total_tulips}>>{total_tulips}.
